thread.title: Video: Video showing California off-duty cop firing gun at teens sparks protests [Video]
thread.title_full: Video: Video showing California off-duty cop firing gun at teens sparks protests [Video]

title: Video: Video showing California off-duty cop firing gun at teens sparks protests [Video]
text: Police in Anaheim, California, arrested about two dozen people overnight during violent protests. Hundreds flooded the streets protesting a shooting involving an off-duty police officer. In a cell phone video, the officer can be seen firing his gun during a confrontation on Tuesday with a group of teens. Carter Evans reports.
